ygData.subject: Re: Wizards are fun - don't ruin it for everyone
ygData.msgSnippet: Hey man, if you can handle a derv by yourself then by all means take the kill if they won t let you in on the rotation. NOBODY can claim a spawning point as
ygData.messageBody:
Hey man, if you can handle a derv by yourself then by all means take the
kill if they won't let you in on the rotation. NOBODY can claim a spawning
point as theirs... they can either create a rotational system or it's FFA.
But you said your getting a bubble of exp. in a half hour? if that's true
than your fighting things that are at least yellow, and i would suspect red.
When i was your lvl i had some high lvl friends in the 30s + that use to
buff me and i could take on reds, and that's the only time when i gained
truly amazing exp. Otherwise, don't expect them to tank for you while you
blast the shit out of them.
And also, just because a party has two nukers and you are one doesn't mean
anything. First off, in parties with more than one nuker i like to conserve
my mana... i like the tanks to do their jobs while i soften the kill up a
bit. This also gives the tank some fun and also cuts down on the downtime.
Maybe you havne't figured this out yet and that's why your such a shitty
person to have in a group, and you're not being invited. I RARELY ever have
to beg around or do shouts for long to find a group. People know my
reputation and playing abilities and WANT me in the group. This game is
more than powerlvling believe it or not. You're still in the low levels,
wait until you're 30+ where you can no longer hang around Unrest or Cazic
and steal kills and actually have to venture forth into dungeons like Lower
Guk and Solusek...lets see you do that solo. By that time most people have
formed regular travelling friends and groups. At higher lvls (i'm at 30+
now) you RARELY see people shouting for groups, and you're just damning
yourself now.


>From: "Neil Lambert" <smartass@...>
>Reply-To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
>To: <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
>Subject: Re: [eq_wizards] Wizards are fun - don't ruin it for everyone
>Date: Tue, 8 Jun 1999 15:47:10 -0700
>
>From: "Neil Lambert" <smartass@...>
>
>i thought this for a while too but now i am a semi-KSer. please, let me
>explain: i spent most of my wizards life trying to keep order at the camps.
>Me being a wizard threatened people by saying that if they stole, i could
>easily steal every kill from them from then on, and it worked... for a
>while. I have tried very hard lately to keep order at camps and nothing
>works. so I gave up. I count the number of people in the camp and wait for
>that many dervs to spawn, then i take the next one... regardless of who's
>"turn" it is. I figure that i have to be at the end of the rotation so
>everyone there has already had a turn when i go and the person that whines
>to me was on his/her second turn. I guess you can call it killstealing, but
>not many get mad because i'm not just stealing everything when i have the
>mana... but that's what i do now... i am moving to a new server soon and i
>am seriously thinking of just going out and stealing everything i can for
>the hell of it. but i don't think i'll do it because i'm a nice guy and
>that
>sucks for everyone else
>-----Original Message-----
>From: Cristie <cristie@...>
>To: eq_wizards@onelist.com <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
>Date: Tuesday, June 08, 1999 1:48 PM
>Subject: Re: [eq_wizards] Wizards are fun - don't ruin it for everyone
>
>
> >From: Cristie <cristie@...>
> >
> >Kill stealing is not the way to make friends for personal or the class as
>a
> >whole. It might serve the purpose of the person at the time, but rest
> >assured, those groups/people you steal kills from WILL remember your name
> >and later on down the road when you can't cast/melee your ass out of a
> >tight spot, if those folks are around they will more than likely just sit
> >and watch you get the crap beat out of you til you die and laugh their
> >heads off. Sad people think this is okay. I get more exp working with a
> >group of 6 than I do alone by far. The bonus for a full group helps a
>lot
> >and if you find the right spots (not telling mine), you will get more
>than
> >enough cash and goodies to go around. We normally have a pile of bodies
>to
> >loot and everyone goes away with their pockets full and their exp bumping
> >up nicely...AND a good feeling.
> >
> >At 04:01 PM 6/8/99 -0400, you wrote:
> >>From: yur@...
> >>
> >>
> >>
> >>I probably will get flamed for this for sure, but who cares.
> >>
> >>I made it all the way to lvl 12 as an erudite wizard. I found that
>leveling
> >>was very slow indeed and it was getting really boring camping with my
>groups
> >>till the sun comes up. However, i was on a few days ago in the morning
> >>and my
> >>regular group wasn't on. I shouted for about 30 min and no one wanted
>to
>join
> >>up with me for bandit hunting. Out of boredom, i went down to the
>bandit
> >>camps
> >>to see if i can find a group there(West karanas on top of Hill). I
>found
>this
> >>group of 6 there camping the bandits so i just sat around shouting for
>groups
> >>once again. But while those guys were fighting the bandits, i thought,
>hey
> >>might
> >>as well try to see if i can kill one solo, if i can't, then they will
>probably
> >>help me anyways. I attacked one bandit and killedh im in 3 shots with
> >>Shock of
> >>Lightning. and WOW ! so much XP !!! so i just kept going. I got
>around
> >>10-15
> >>pp in 30 min and gained 1 bubble of xp. normall i gain 1 bubble in 6-8
> >>hours of
> >>playing. FINALLY ! i found how to have fun with my wizard and not be
>the
> >>lamer
> >>that spent all his time trying to group and get shitty XP cuz of the
>split
> >>between members !! who cares if they think i am a kill stealer, its
>not
>like
> >>they can do anything about it HAHAHA. too bad for them that they wont
>group
> >>with me. I also found some wizards are really stupid, the group of 6 i
>was
> >>stealing from had a lvl 14 wizard and a lvl 11 wizard. and none of them
>could
> >>stop me from stealing. its odd but true... ppl just don't think.. oh
>well.. i
> >>hope you all try to just have fun and not give a shit what other ppl
>think
>for
> >>once. then you might find why Varent say we are a balanced race, i
> >>personally
> >>think we were made to give grief to others heehhe.. j/k I personally
> >>think we
> >>should be changed to Erudite Magical Theives hehe..
> >>
> >>
> >>
